name: I-WeneLock
0:
”Alexa, lock door lock”
”Alexa, lock the door lock.”
”Alexa,lock my door lock”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Hardware Requirements:
1. Gateway- sold separately
2. Echo/Dot

Get Started:

1. Check that the I-Wen eLock app is able to lock/unlock using Bluetooth.

2. Check that the I-Wen eLock app is able to “remotely” lock/unlock using the gateway

3. Enable the I-Wen eLock skill in Alexa

4. Link the I-Wen eLock account and provide permission to access your locks.

5. Once Alexa discovers the Lock, you can issue voice commands to Alexa as outlined below:

Alexa, lock the door lock
(door lock is the name of smart lock,you can rename the smart lock in the I-Wen eLock app)
Alexa, unlock the door lock
(you should enable unlock feature in Alexa app)
